value.title: Smart devices could use AI to tell where your voice is coming from

value.title: Tesla Full Self-Driving Beta appears to detect and avoid road debris in video
value.excerpt: Driving Beta has impressed with its capacity to navigate city streets and it now looks like it can also detect and avoid road debris, according to a new video. value.title: Former Walmart Exec’s Company Uses AI To Battle Billions In Spoiled Produce
value.excerpt: More than $15 billion in produce shipments to food stores is wasted or rejected each year. But a former Walmart shipping executive has started a company to help reduce those losses by using technology to streamline the process.

value.title: Former Google exec’s VC invests $30m into Chinese robotics startup MegaRobo
value.excerpt: MegaRobo, a Chinese startup focused on the development of robots and the Internet of Things, announced that it has raised US$30 million in a series B round led by Sinovation Ventures, a VC firm founded by Google China’s former president Kai-Fu Lee.

value.title: Ocado has purchased two robotics firms to take on Amazon
value.excerpt: UK technology firm Ocado has acquired two robotics start-ups from the US as the company looks to boost efficiency in its warehouses. The purchase of San Francisco firm Kindred Systems for $262 million and Las Vegas-based Haddington Dynamics for $25 million in cash and shares should help the retailer introduce more automation solutions.

value.title: Pope Francis: Pray that robotics and AI always serve humankind
value.excerpt: Pope Francis has invited Catholics around the world to pray that robotics and artificial intelligence will remain always at the service of human beings.

value.title: Google's Waymo is pulling its self-driving cars out of San Francisco in case violence erupts around the election
value.excerpt: The company will also stop testing on San Francisco's streets for the next two days as the 2020 presidential election unfolds.

value.title: How to Make Artificial Intelligence Less Biased
value.excerpt: AI systems can unfairly penalize certain segments of the population—especially women and minorities. Researchers and tech companies are figuring out how to address that.

value.title: 4 Things to Consider Before You Start Using AI in Personnel Decisions

value.title: This supermarket has purchased two robotics firms to take on Amazon
value.excerpt: UK online supermarket Ocado has acquired two robotics start-ups from the US as the company looks to boost efficiency in its warehouses. The purchase of San Francisco firm Kindred Systems for $262 million and Las Vegas-based Haddington Dynamics for $25 million in cash and shares should help the retailer introduce more automation solutions.

value.title: Inside Paramount’s 2020 Survival Strategy: Earn More Selling Off Films Than Releasing Them
value.excerpt: Paramount's strategy to sell off some of its films while theaters remain shut down may be paying off for the studio.
